title: Reckless Royal
description: The playboy prince is about to meet his match.Women. Fast Cars. VIP access to all of London’s hottest clubs. It didn't matter because I was never supposed to ascend the throne. But suddenly, I’m first in line and every single move I make is splashed across the headlines for all to see.To redeem my image as the reckless royal, the queen has found a suitable woman for me to marry. A woman so opposite my type, it’s laughable.But as I get to know her, there’s something that draws me in. Her soft eyes. Her big heart. The way everyone around her falls under her spell.I never expected to fall in love.Losing my heart might be the most reckless thing I’ve ever done.Reckless Royal is book two in the Ainsworth Royals series, and is a HEA with no cheating or cliffhanger.
author: Emily Silver
